channel.title: Is this a way to delete a wall?

item.title: Is this a way to delete a wall?
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

To delete a curved (diagonal) wall, you put the coords from both sides.
To delete a straight wall, you delete the coords from every side.

like:
X X X
X O X
X X X

Delete the coords of the X’s to remove the O,

Read full topic
item.source: Is this a way to delete a wall?

item.title: Is this a way to delete a wall?
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“Mod Val, post:5, topic:307194”][quote author=RunescapeOwnage link=topic=403322.msg2987009#msg2987009 date=1255049259]
look ingame where the coords to the wall you want to del and search for it

[/quote]

Ok, that’s helpful. Don’t even post you post hungry noob. You can’t just sit on a wall and get the coords, walls are in between coords. If did it like you said id have to walk at e.x. X 1000.5 Y 1000 vise versa.[/quote]

Do you get pleasure from calling people post hungry ‘noobs’. And yes, you actually fucking can. Just walk on the damn wall and type ::mypos and like magic and shit, it tells you where you are (ON TOP OF THE FUCKING WALL???) and gives you the coords.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this a way to delete a wall?
item.dc:creator: @p00n_scape p00n scape
item.description:
@p00n_scape wrote:

in Client.java

Search for:
Code:

case 121

You should see something like:
Code:

replaceDoors(); // if(heightLevel == 1) // ReplaceObject(2591, 3107, 375, -3, 11); // we could use this to make the char appear for other players only // until // this guys loading is done. Also wait with regular player updates // until we receive this command. // println_debug("Loading finished."); Deleteobjects(); writePlayers(); NewObjects(); hasntLoggedin = true; //server.checkPlayerCapes.processAll(this); if(!isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)){ setInterfaceWalkable(-1); hasWildySign = false; } break;
Ok, under “Deleteobjects();” add this:
Code:

                        Deletewalls();

Read full topic

item.title: Is this a way to delete a wall?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Val Mod Val
item.description:
@Mod_Val wrote:

[quote=“p00n scape, post:2, topic:307194”]Add this in ur Client.java under all the Code of DeletethatObject

public void deletethatwall(int objectX, int objectY) { ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 6951, -1, 0); }

Under it add: This is To place the WallCoords there

[code] public void Deletewalls() {

deletethatwall(####, ####); // Wall Coords

}[/code][/quote]

How do you find the wall coords?
